§ Berachain Address

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

A **berachain address** is a person's, organizations, etc, representation on the [[berachain]] [[blockchain-network]].

For example, tt is what holds the [[bera]] token, the [[berachain-governance-token]] ($BGT), etc.

§§ Compatibility

A **berachain address** is the same as an [[evm-address]].

In fact, one can use any [[evm-address]] with [[berachain]], including an [[ethereum-address]], a monad-address, a polygon-address, a sonic-address, etc.
